artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Jean-Florentine Defraine; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
catalogue_raissonne:
Colas 1936
Cabinet des Modes
Le Brun
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Fashion periodical with a trifold hand-colored engraving of two belt buckles on the left; in the center a man in green breeches, green and white striped socks, a yellow coat with pink and green stripes, a black hat, and a walking stick; on the right a woman holds a fan in a white and green gown with pink detailing and a white and green hat with a pink interior and pink plumes with purple dots
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Troisième Année, Dix-neuvième Cahier, 20 Mai 1788
